item.title: Anomalous Curves Part 2: p-adic niceties
item.description: $$ \def\F{\mathbb{F}} $$ $$ \def\Q{\mathbb{Q}} \def\F{\mathbb{F}} \def\Z{\mathbb{Z}} $$ This is part two of the series on anomalous curves. Go here for part one. Today, I’ll give a sketch of the construction of Smart’s attack. This attack combines two elliptic curve tools: The reduction map of an elliptic curve over a local field. The formal group of an elliptic curve. I will focus on the first one, and leave the details of the second for another post.
